item.title: 油价疲软，S&P 将 Suncor 的评级下调至略高于垃圾级
item.description: 加拿大石油公司 Suncor Energy Inc 的长期信用评级被 S&P Global Ratings 下调一档，比垃圾级低一级，因为较低的能源价格威胁到该能源公司的收入。【原文：Canadian oil company Suncor Energy Inc’s long-term credit rating was cut one notch to a step above junk by S&P Global Ratings, as lower energy prices threaten the energy firm’s revenue.】

item.title: 优步投资者呼吁提高司机薪酬透明度
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. ）的一批投资者呼吁该打车服务公司披露更多有关如何支付司机薪酬的信息，称更清晰的明细对于评估该公司的盈利能力至关重要。【原文：A group of investors in Uber Technologies Inc. is calling on the ride-hailing service to disclose more information on how it pays drivers, saying a clearer breakdown is critical to assessing the company’s ability to make money.】

item.title: 尤尼芬家族对抗萨利纳斯集团索赔引发的指控
item.description: 在亿万富翁里卡多-萨利纳斯-普利戈（Ricardo Salinas Pliego）的公司提出申诉后，墨西哥检察官一直在寻求逮捕与该国最大的影子银行之一有关的家族成员。【原文：After complaints by billionaire Ricardo Salinas Pliego’s companies, prosecutors in Mexico have been seeking the arrest of family members associated with what was one of the country’s biggest shadow banks.】

item.title: 法国资产管理公司 Tikehau 计划裁员 15

item.title: 巴西总统卢拉表示将 "警惕 "新财政措施的必要性
item.description: 路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统说，他的政府已采取措施维护巴西的财政规则，并重申他对即将上任的央行行长加布里埃尔-加里波洛的支持，这是他在紧急手术后返回巴西利亚后首次发表公开言论。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva said his government had taken steps to safeguard Brazil’s fiscal rules and reaffirmed his support of incoming central bank chief Gabriel Galipolo, his first public comments since returning to Brasilia following emergency surgery.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚意外降息四分之一点，周期放缓
item.description: 哥伦比亚央行意外降息 25 个基点，低于几乎所有经济学家的预期，原因是对财政的担忧超过了对经济疲软的担忧。【原文：Colombia’s central bank unexpectedly cut interest rates by 25 basis points, less than expected by the nearly all economists, as fiscal concerns outweighed worries about a weakening economy.】

item.title: 美联储逆回购机制余额降至 1,000 亿美元以下
item.description: 在政策制定者本周调整了参数后，投资者在美联储主要机构的资金停放量自 2021 年以来首次降至 1,000 亿美元以下。【原文：The amount of money investors park at a major Federal Reserve facility dropped below $100 billion for the first time since 2021 after policymakers adjusted the parameters this week.】

item.title: 丰业银行称 BCE 必须削减股息才能实现扭亏为盈
item.description: 今年，BCE 公司的股价跌至 14 年来的最低点，海湾街（Bay Street）的一位分析师表示，这家加拿大最大的电信公司需要削减股息。【原文：After a year that sent BCE Inc. shares to a 14-year low, a Bay Street analyst said Canada’s largest telecom company needs to cut its dividend.】

item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc）六个月来首次购买西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum Corp.【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc. purchased Occidental Petroleum Corp. shares for the first time in six months, adding to a bet that has billionaire investor Warren Buffett nursing a rare loss since first buying common stock two years ago.】

item.title: 大众汽车与工会就削减产能和保持德国工厂开放达成协议
item.description: 大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）与工会领导人达成协议，削减其同名品牌的产能，同时避免关闭工厂，结束了长达三个月的紧张谈判，避免了更多的工会罢工。【原文：Volkswagen AG reached an agreement with labor leaders to cut capacity at its namesake brand while avoiding factory closures, capping three months of tense negotiations and preventing further union walkouts.】

item.title: 亿万富翁德拉希将居住地从瑞士迁至以色列
item.description: 帕特里克-德拉希（Patrick Drahi）已将他的正式居住地迁往以色列，这标志着这位电信亿万富翁将离开他在瑞士的长期基地，把注意力转向中东。【原文：Patrick Drahi has transferred his official residency to Israel, signaling a departure from the telecom billionaire’s longstanding base in Switzerland as he turns his focus to the Middle East.】

item.title: 以色列间谍软件制造商罕见地被美国私募基金收购
德国哈贝克 "关注 "联合信贷对德国商业银行的收购行动
item.description: 德国经济部长罗伯特-哈贝克（Robert Habeck）表示，他对意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）与德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）的接触表示担忧，这加剧了柏林对潜在交易的反对。【原文：German Economy Minister Robert Habeck said he’s concerned about UniCredit SpA’s approach of Commerzbank AG, adding to opposition in Berlin to a potential deal.】

item.title: 新民主党领袖称将投票推翻特鲁多政府
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理将于周五公布新内阁，但在一位重要的反对党领袖表示将投票推翻总理政府后，他本人的政治前途受到严重质疑。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau will unveil a new cabinet on Friday, but his own political future is in serious doubt after a key opposition leader said he’ll vote to bring the prime minister’s government down.】

item.title: 小额贷款市场创纪录的巨额交易让银行家获胜
item.description: 今年是大型市政债券交易的丰收年，华尔街的银行家们认为这种情况只会持续到 2025 年。【原文：It’s been a banner year for mega-municipal bond deals and Wall Street bankers only see it continuing through 2025.】

item.title: 禽流感在美国烘焙季节爆发，鸡蛋价格屡创新高
item.description: 由于禽流感疫情愈演愈烈，导致美国数百万只蛋鸡死亡，节日期间的鸡蛋价格将创下历史新高。【原文：Holiday bakers are looking at record US prices for eggs as an intensifying bird flu outbreak has killed millions of the nation’s laying hens.】

item.title: 纽约交通拥堵定价周五面临关键法律障碍
item.description: 下个月，纽约将开始对进入曼哈顿部分地区的驾车者收费，这一颇具争议的计划可能会因一系列法律挑战而搁浅。【原文：New York’s controversial program to start charging motorists entering parts of Manhattan next month could be derailed by a slew of legal challenges that are beginning to come to a head.】

item.title: 美联储和特朗普贸易推动美元创 2016 年以来最佳季度表现
item.description: 本周，美元汇率攀升至两年来的新高，美国经济的复苏和美联储的鹰派前景增强了美元的吸引力。【原文：The dollar is headed for its best quarter in eight years, with the currency climbing to a two-year high this week as a resilient US economy and a hawkish Federal Reserve outlook have bolstered its appeal.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会称德意志银行延迟报告可疑活动
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的一个部门同意支付 400 万美元，以了结美国证券交易委员会对其未及时调查可疑活动的指控，其中包括两起等待两年多才提交报告的案件。【原文：A unit of Deutsche Bank AG agreed to pay $4 million to settle US Securities and Exchange Commission allegations that it failed to investigate suspicious activity in a timely manner, including two cases where it waited more than two years to file reports.】

item.title: 瑞银赵明计划在特朗普政策冲击经济增长前买入美国债券
item.description: 瑞银资产管理公司（UBS Asset Management）的凯文-赵（Kevin Zhao）计划在今年假期期间继续工作，他希望如果美国国债在交易量稀少的情况下出现抛售，他能在那里买入。【原文：UBS Asset Management’s Kevin Zhao plans to keep working during the holidays this year, hoping that if US Treasuries selloff amid thin trading volumes he’ll be there to buy.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比认为明年的降息之路将更加渺茫
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，他将2025年的利率前景略微调高了一些，但他补充说，他仍预计借贷成本在未来12至18个月内将 "再下降相当多一点"。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said he adjusted his outlook for interest rates a little higher for 2025 but added he still expects borrowing costs to fall a “fair bit more” over the next 12 to 18 months.】

item.title: 特鲁多与弗里兰的惊人通话引发加拿大政治危机
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多的政治前途几个月来一直摇摇欲坠。但威胁到他加拿大总理任期终结的事件在短短几天内就滚雪球般地演变成了一场危机。【原文：Justin Trudeau’s political future has been shaky for months. But the events that threaten to finish him as Canada’s prime minister snowballed into a crisis in a matter of days.】

item.title: 巴西哈达德认为紧缩计划几乎不会被国会否决
item.description: 据巴西财政部长称，路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统的财政紧缩计划正在通过巴西国会的修改，其潜在节余将仅减少 10 亿雷亚尔（约合 1.64 亿美元），远远低于人们的预期。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s austerity plan is passing through Brazil’s congress with changes that will reduce its potential savings by only 1 billion reais ($164 million), far less than feared, according to the nation’s finance chief.】
